document.full_text: greece laid out plans to sell stakes in key state firms and make further budget savings on friday, hoping to avert a debt restructuring which financial markets view as increasingly likely.
document.title: greece sell-off plans fail to quell new debt worries
lines_and_colors: greece laid out plans to sell stakes in key state firms and make further budget savings on friday, hoping to avert a debt restructuring which financial markets view as increasingly likely.
